Package companyappointmentmanagementsystem.model

Class Dao

  • java.lang.Object
    • companyappointmentmanagementsystem.model.Dao
  • public final class Dao
extends java.lang.Object
    This class contains method to access the database. Use the methods of this class to perform CRUD operation on different table. MySQL database is used for this application. So, the database configuration is read from a configuration file 'config/mysql_database_connection_parameters.properties' under project root.

      • checkAppointmentOverlapping

        public boolean checkAppointmentOverlapping​(int appointmentId,
                                           int customerId,
                                           java.time.LocalDateTime startDateTime,
                                           java.time.LocalDateTime endDateTime)
        Checks weather given appointment start and end date time overlaps with other appoint of the user or the customer
        Parameters:
        appointmentId - the id of the appointment to exclude from this checking, use -1 to check every records
        customerId - customer id
        startDateTime - start date time in UTC
        endDateTime - end date time in UTC
        Returns:
        true if overlaps, false otherwise

      • getUpComingAppointment

        Parameters:

        Returns:

      • close

        public void close()
        Close the current database connection and makes the singleton instance null. Call this method only when application exits
